role.name: Chef
role.role_text: You start knowing how many pairs of evil players are neighboring each other.

role.name: Empath
role.role_text: Each night, you learn how many of your 2 alive neighbors are evil

role.name: Fortune Teller
role.role_text: Each night, chose 2 players: you learn if either id a Demon. There is 1 good player that registers falsely to you.

role.name: Investigator
role.role_text: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Minion

role.name: Librarian
role.role_text: You start knowing that 1 of 2 players is a particular Outsider. (Or that zero are in play)

role.name: Drunk
role.role_text: You do not know you are the Drunk. You think you are a Townsfolk, but your ability malfunctions.

role.name: Scarlet Woman
role.role_text: If there are 5 or more players alive and the Demon dies, you become the Demon. (Travelers do not count)

role.name: Imp
role.role_text: Each night (execept the first), choose a player; they die. If you chose yourself you die and a Minion becomes the Imp
